message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product but I can only afford $100.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that price.

I understand that 180 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a compromise at 140. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's my final offer.

I understand that 140 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you a price of 130, which is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still outside of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's my final offer.

I understand that 130 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you a price of 127, which is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
